Report.SearchSQL: SELECT apo.[AssetID] ,ai.[ShortDescription] as [AssetName] ,ai.[AssetTypeName] ,ai.[SerialNumber] ,apo.[PurchaseOrderDetailID] ,podi.[PurchaseOrderNo] ,podi.[SequenceNumber] as [POSequenceNumber] ,podi.[ItemDescription] as [POItemDescription] ,podi.[VendorName] as [POVendorName] FROM dbo.[AssetPurchaseOrder] as apo JOIN dbo.[AssetInfo] as ai on ai.[AssetID] = apo.[AssetID] JOIN dbo.[PurchaseOrderDetailInfo] as podi on podi.PurchaseOrderDetailID = apo.[PurchaseOrderDetailID]
